admin-notice.body: This admin version allows you to edit slots assigned to your clan. This link is intended to be only available for leading personalities. The normal user should receive this link.
admin-notice.heading: Attention, don't share this link.

main.heading: Joint Ops Slottingtool
main.introduction-text: Click on a slot to mark your attendance. Click again to deregister. No account needed. We look forward to see you!

name-dialog.body:
Please insert a valid name that should be visible in the slot list.
Please exclude any clan tags. We will take care of them.
name-dialog.heading: Slot user

not-shared.body: This slot is not shared for you
not-shared.heading: Not shared
